mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ts_role ( ROLE_NAME, ROLE_TYPE, ROLE_SCOPE, ORG_ID, ORG_SIMPLE_NAME, AVAILABLE, MEMO, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME ) VALUES ( #{roleName}, #{roleType}, #{roleScope}, #{orgId}, #{orgSimpleName}, #{available}, #{memo}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime} )
mapper.update: update ts_role set ROLE_NAME=#{roleName}, ROLE_TYPE=#{roleType}, ROLE_SCOPE=#{roleScope}, ORG_ID=#{orgId}, ORG_SIMPLE_NAME=#{orgSimpleName}, AVAILABLE=#{available}, MEMO=#{memo}, CREATE_USER=#{createUser}, UPDATE_USER=#{updateUser}, CREATE_TIME=#{createTime}, UPDATE_TIME=#{updateTime} where ROLE_ID=#{roleId}
mapper.select: SELECT ROLE_ID, ROLE_NAME, ROLE_TYPE, ROLE_SCOPE, ORG_ID, ORG_SIMPLE_NAME, AVAILABLE, MEMO, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME FROM ts_role
select ROLE_ID, ROLE_NAME, ROLE_TYPE, ROLE_SCOPE, ORG_ID, ORG_SIMPLE_NAME, AVAILABLE, MEMO, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME from ts_role where ROLE_ID=#{roleId}
